README:
This repository contains all the source files required to deploy a heterogeneous wireless sensor network which consists of 4 different hardware platforms (TelosB, SunSPOT, Arduino, iSense).

The most recent technical report published at:

http://arxiv.org/abs/1102.0058

Please cite this work in scientific papers as:

Orestis Akribopoulos, Vasileios Georgitzikis, Christos Koninis, Ioannis Papavasileiou and Ioannis Chatzigiannakis: Deployment and Evaluation of a 802.15.4 Heterogeneous Network. Technical Report in ACM Computing Research Repository, arXiv:1102.0058, February, 2011.
